item.title: Akwaaba! A Pan Regional African Python Conference and The Year of Return
item.description:
Recently I returned from my first trip to West Africa visiting Lagos, Nigeria and Accra, Ghana.

In preparation for the trip, I had to obtain not one but two visas …
